## Project: Journaling App with Vite and Tailwind CSS

This is a journaling application built with Vite and Tailwind CSS that features:
- A yearly calendar view showing all 12 months
- Visual indicators for days with journal entries
- Clean, responsive design using Tailwind CSS
- Modern development setup with Vite for fast development

### Development Guidelines
- Use functional React components with hooks
- Implement responsive design principles
- Use Tailwind CSS utility classes for styling
- Follow modern JavaScript/React best practices
- Keep components modular and reusable
